title: @KateyKhaos in regards to Lissandra...
body:
i will wait RIGHT HERE and return when many moons have passed and Lissy gets a new skin >:(

Here's hoping for a Queen Lissandra~

replies.body:
Does this work for you? :D 

http://imgur.com/JuLgGKz

Program Lisandra just hit PBE! :D 

(Told you I'd remember!)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=VowEXFa0,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-22T20:00:48.966+0000)
>
> Does this work for you? :D 
> 
> http://imgur.com/JuLgGKz
> 
> Program Lisandra just hit PBE! :D 
> 
> (Told you I'd remember!)

no. bleeping. way. Katey. wow. this skin is amazing. seriously, thank you for coming back to this post. if i ever go to riot headquarters i'm bringing you a cupcake or something. holy Alistar this is great news.

Dude, it's so hard to not say anything. When I saw the original post, I knew she was in development, and I was like ... I KNOW IT'S BEEN A WHILE, WE'RE WORKING ON HER. (Partially why I saved this post - wanted to show you what we had in the works ASAP!)

You should visit! We have official tours now! If you bring cupcakes, I mean, they're going to be Lulu cupcakes, right? :3

Secrets like these are very difficult to keep down or resist hinting at. I knew you guys had something in development or else you would have formally said that you weren't going to make any more Lissandra skins for a while. or something among those lines. It was only a matter of time.

I'll be honest and say I was annoyed to the bone when I saw that Draven and Tahm got new skins. I could understand Maokai and Vel'koz but no the other two. But now I feel a whole lot better knowing my Queen lives to fight more battles. With this skin, I will dominate the Summoner's Rift >:)

And although I dont know how to make cupcakes, I'll learn and make you some Lulu-cakes. I'll make Phreak some pun-cakes... I'll show myself out now.

Yeah, I usually go with saying something like, "I can't say if x champ does/doesn't have something in development" because I don't want to hint one way or the other. :P

I totally get the frustration. From a dev standpoint, we have a ton in development at any given time. When we're talking a group of skins (like these Mecha/Program skins), we need to make sure they're all done at the same time. 

As for April Fools', since it's a timed event, (has to happen on April 1st), they would come first before the other skins. I agree, it's not the best feeling to see two skins for a champion, or a new skin for a newer champion, buuuut, we usually have some other stuff up our sleeve! 

(We also don't want to rush things!)

Lulucakes?! Yes, please! I'm sure Phreak would appreciate pun-cakes. :P But seriously, if you're ever in the area, it'd be cool to say hello! :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=VowEXFa0,comment-id=00020003000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-22T20:39:06.141+0000)
>
> Yeah, I usually go with saying something like, "I can't say if x champ does/doesn't have something in development" because I don't want to hint one way or the other. :P
> 
> I totally get the frustration. From a dev standpoint, we have a ton in development at any given time. When we're talking a group of skins (like these Mecha/Program skins), we need to make sure they're all done at the same time. 
> 
> As for April Fools', since it's a timed event, (has to happen on April 1st), they would come first before the other skins. I agree, it's not the best feeling to see two skins for a champion, or a new skin for a newer champion, buuuut, we usually have some other stuff up our sleeve! 
> 
> (We also don't want to rush things!)
> 
> Lulucakes?! Yes, please! I'm sure Phreak would appreciate pun-cakes. :P But seriously, if you're ever in the area, it'd be cool to say hello! :D

Dat Liss looks absolutely great!
Still waiting for Talon though. :^)
We're making rounds for champions who haven't had a skin in a while - Lissandra and Sion!  We know we're not done just yet! :P

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=VowEXFa0,comment-id=0002000300000000000000010000,timestamp=2016-03-22T21:50:16.996+0000)
>
> We're making rounds for champions who haven't had a skin in a while - Lissandra and Sion!  We know we're not done just yet! :P

Waiting on my boy Nocturne :P
He's also on the list!

Eligible, yes! But, Captain Gangplank is counted as a skin, iirc. Doesn't make him entirely off the list, but he wouldn't be top priority. If we're comparing him to Nocturne and they both work for a thematic, but we could only make one,  we'd try to push for Nocturne to receive a skin.

Unsure what kind of concept would work for both GP and Nocturne, but I can see what you mean :P
Thanks for the awnser! ^^
Haha, yeah, that's a bit of a stretch, but I think you get what I mean. ^-^
Question: could we expect if/when Noc's skin is made, to have a small remake of the smoketail for all skins? Just like a few other champs got partial tech updates to go with skins, like Zac

It would be a nice to have, but something that's worth a discussion. We have done similar things in the past, such as adding turn tech and whatnot. If we have a solution that's viable and a quick fix for all skins, we're absolutely for implementing it.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=VowEXFa0,comment-id=0002000300000000000000010000,timestamp=2016-03-22T21:50:16.996+0000)
>
> We're making rounds for champions who haven't had a skin in a while - Lissandra and Sion!  We know we're not done just yet! :P

I feel like Kalista is due for a skin. A unique skin though, not just a Thresh skin copied onto Kalista.

I look forward to Rumble's next skin.
Rumble last skin was 2  years ago & has a very small skin collection for an older champ.He only has 3 skins,one is a legacy & one is a legendary.Leaving only one cheap skin that's always available & it's an old one too.
You think a champ like Rumble would provide a lot of opportuninties for a skin.

Rumble is actually pretty tricky in terms of animations and an overall thematic! We won't give up on him, though. He's certainly on the radar in terms of champions who haven't seen some love in a while. :)

> who haven't had a skin in a while

Not sure when he got his last skin but gem boy should be high up the list too then, right? :>
Speaking of which, he is still missing in todays update. Will he come tomorrow though? :c
Mr. Truly Outrageous will be eligible for a skin once his update goes out. :D Not sure when he's making his debut just yet.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=VowEXFa0,comment-id=0002000300000000000000010000,timestamp=2016-03-22T21:50:16.996+0000)
>
> We're making rounds for champions who haven't had a skin in a while - Lissandra and Sion!  We know we're not done just yet! :P

That sounds good :D

All things aside, I very much appreciate the communication from you and everyone else who finds the time to talk to us. You guys have your hands full with more things than we can ever imagine and while me do complain or get upset from time to time, it feels great seeing all the progress you guys are making and all the effort you guys put into keeping us informed on things. There aren't many companies, gaming or otherwise, who take as much care of their customers/clients as well as you guys have proved.

It's such an honor to be sitting here and talking to you in such a nonchalant way. I've never had this experience and I hope it's not the last, from you guys or any other company.

Thank you again and I hope to see you guys at Riot HQ soon.

Any time! It's honestly fun for me to take some time out of the day (usually just eating lunch at my desk :P) and talk to you guys. 

When people get upset, I don't take it personally. Honestly, people get mad because they're passionate about something most of the time, especially when it comes to skins. ^-^ 

Oh! And we don't consider you guys clients/customers - we actually refer to everyone as players! While we're Rioters, we're also considered players, we just happen to work on the game! That said, your feedback is a huge contribution to the game, and we've changed a **ton** of skins based on player feedback, which I think is wicked (there goes my Massachusetts lingo) cool! 

Shouldn't be the last interaction - we're happy to chat when we've got some spare time, especially when new content comes out! :D 

If you're down, we could always play a game sometime - maybe ARAM? :3 

Oh! And if you've got feedback for ~~GLaDOS ~~Program Lissandra, drop it on PBE if you have an account, or just poke me!

New Lissandra skin? Invitation to Riot HQ? A game with you guys? Do you wanna give me a heart attack with so much awesome stuff!?

While I don't have a PBE account, if I think of any ways to improve Lissandra's skin I'll definitely get in contact with you. Buuuut I doubt I'll find anything. Besides, anymore concerns and I fear her skin might get delayed and that's not what I want hahaha

Pls no heart attack! 

But yeah, seriously, let's play some time! Also, if you're serious about tours **[here's the FAQ](http://www.riotgames.com/tours/faqs)**.

Unless she breaks into pieces, she shouldn't be delayed!

Thank you for the link. I'm already freaking excited!

{{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}}
Happy to help!
also, before you go, give Jack a thank you on my part. he has yet to drop by this thread but i know he is one of the people at the center of Lissandra'a new skin. Thank you again.

> [{quoted}](name=Aemette,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=VowEXFa0,comment-id=0002000300000000,timestamp=2016-03-22T20:33:30.067+0000)
>I'll make Phreak some pun-cakes
>puncakes

...

How do I unpun my brain now...
Watch out for the caitlyn traps.

Oh, you're right! 

NO TARPS PLS.
Lets be real you'd go for the yordle cupcakes anyway. We all would.

That and Rivington but you know... whatever...

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
So is Riv a cupcake... or a tarp?
I would. :c

Dw your evil colleagues took away the damage and AP ratios.

Still salty.
Now I have to main her... THIS SKIN IS GORGEOUS THANK YOU KATEY
Ahhh, so glad you like her! :D

Seriously this is by far my favorite skin of all time <3

Is there any cool facts/ cannon informations about this skin? I saw another rioter in another thread say something about her controling and army of I-Blitzcrank, this is so amazing!

Mmmm, nothing else that's really cannon.

As for cool facts, her base is a mix of geo and particles, that are then animated to give her the flowy walk she has. Her ult has two different models for the entombed geo - one for her ulting herself and one for ulting enemies. In development, we need to make sure the enemy ult is properly sized for all champions because Annie is certainly not the same size as Alistar. :3 (It has a tendency to break, haha.)

I love her base! It looks like she is coming out of the digital world to destroy you muahahahahaha

And the ult is just amazing *_* so is the field around her target... and her Q... and E... and W... AND EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS SKIN

https://media.giphy.com/media/duGmnxv5TZDy/giphy.gif

\*Hype intensifies*
wut iz geo?
Oh, it's basically a model. :D

That splash art is SO rad

oh my god. 1350, I assume?
Glad you like her! Yup, she's 1350 RP.
Cool, can't wait to wait 6 months before I get her.
\*Bookmarks*

Arclight Lissandra, if this happens, I'll happily live with the regret of not waiting last Snowdown to see if she gets a new skin. 
Because Arclight Lissandra.
Amethyst Lissandra! D: ;_; I love purple, and ice.
